title: Massive Screen tearing/FPS when FPS is good
body: Hi, I am having massive screen tearing or looks like hard fps /lagspikes. But My Ms in game is good and I have 60 fps stable. I recently did  a pc refresh as MY computer had some issues and ever since the refresh my in game League is having this issues. Its unplayable. My fps in other games is fine like world of warcraft. But in league the screen tearing is just unplayable. Plz help me fix this.

replies.body:
Screen tearing? Have you tried disabling/enabling v-sync in League of Legends itself?

As far as I know, if you're getting screen tearing in League, then that's a problem outside of the game. What graphics card drivers do you have installed?

Is your graphics driver fully up to date after your refresh? 
I would also look at your graphics settings to see if you are not over working the GPU. 
If you have an Nvidia card go with the optimal settings.
